news.content:
Together with Take Action Global ü§ù we are taking real action to make the ThreeFold Grid the first planet-positive üåç Internet infrastructure in the world.


Take a look at our three-part series to explore these efforts:


  • Pt I: ThreeFold on track to be planet-positive
  • Pt II: Supporting initiatives to regenerate the planet
  • Pt III: Driving regeneration with Take Action Global

You can support a planet-positive Internet by becoming a farmer! All you have to do is connect capacity to the grid and you‚Äôre effortlessly contributing to the regeneration of our planet, as this model will allow all farms to become planet positive by default.


  • Buy a Certified 3Node
  • Build a DIY 3Node
news.excerpt: How we are taking real action with Take Action Global to enables the world's first planet-positive Internet infrastructure.

previous.title: Presenting the new Explorer UI for Grid 3.x
previous.excerpt: The updated Explorer brings a simple interface and true decentralization to the way compute, storage, and network capacity information is sourced from 3Nodes.
